review: I really like the picture quality and speedy processor. It feels like a solid device, not that plastic feel like the competition. I own several Rokus and a Chrome cast. If you're into the Amazon ecosystem as I am, then it could work well for you. However, I use the USB port on my Roku often and  I watch YouTube on my TV a lot. If you're into using your external apps or the USB port to access media, then this may not be for you at this particular time. If you want Netflix, Amazon Instant Video and some games and apps, then give this a try. Did I mention the picture quality is excellent?!?!
author: Amazon Customer
